abstract: Jeffrey B. Kindler, who retired as Pfizer’s chairman and chief executive at the end of 2011, has joined Lux Capital as a venture partner, the firm announced on Wednesday.
snippet: Jeffrey B. Kindler, who retired as Pfizer’s chairman and chief executive at the end of 2011, has joined Lux Capital as a venture partner, the firm announced on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Jeffrey B. Kindler, who retired as Pfizer‘s chairman and chief executive at the end of 2011, has joined Lux Capital as a venture partner, the firm announced on Wednesday.

headline.main: Kindler, Former Pfizer Chief, Joins Lux Capital

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
